channel.title: Books on John Forstmeier
channel.description: Recent content in Books on John Forstmeier

item.title: Books
item.description: This is a little collection of short works of science fiction dubbed The Bellefonte Trilogy. They’re in a continual “work-in-progress” state and will be steadily edited and refined going forward so changes both large and small should be expected. All of these changes can be seen in the Git history - feedback and comments are welcome. Knowing And Triumphant The Summation War Chosen For Elysium
